Virtuosic Performer (Winds).name: 精湛演技（管乐） Virtuosic Performer (Winds)
Virtuosic Performer (Winds).description:
你特别擅长一种表演类型。你在一种表演形式的演出上获得+1环境加值。当你在表演技能上达到大师级熟练度时，这个加值提升到+2。

范例演出 风笛、长笛、竖笛、小号

如果你的演出无法被归类到特定的表演类型时，GM决定你的具体表演类型。

Vision Of Weakness.name: 识破弱点 Vision Of Weakness
Vision Of Weakness.description: 你能唤来神力洞察识破敌人的弱点。你习得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NhNKzq1DvFxkvTEc]{识破弱点 Vision of Weakness}启示法术。增加你的聚能池1点。

Visual Fidelity.name: 视觉保真 Visual Fidelity
Visual Fidelity.description:
你找到一种方式将一大堆装置组合起来，在任何状况下都保证你所见为真。你获得黑暗视觉和昏暗视觉，你可以以半透明的形状看到 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形} 的生物和物品，但这种形状比较模糊，其对你而言是 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽} 状态。

如果一个效果会让你陷入 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲} 状态，该效果必须尝试一次反制检定对抗你的职业DC，你的反制等级等于你职业的一半（取高）。如果反制检定失败，你不会目盲——你各种各样的设备弥补了你的视力。

Vitality-Manipulating Stance.name: Vitality-Manipulating Stance
Vitality-Manipulating Stance.description:
You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points like your rival Shino Hakusa. You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals [[/r {1d4}[negative]]]{1d4 negative damage}, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile positive traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

大成功 The target is unaffected.

成功 The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

失败 As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

大失败 As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.

Vivacious Afterimage.name: Vivacious Afterimage
Vivacious Afterimage.description:
需求 You have panache.

You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you. You Stride. At any point along your movement, you leave an afterimage of yourself behind. Alternatively, you can stop moving and send your afterimage forward instead, up to the remainder of your Speed. A creature that spends actions to engage with your afterimage can attempt to disbelieve it with a Will save against your class DC. Once an enemy has disbelieved any of your afterimages, they are temporarily immune to all of your Vivacious Afterimages for 10 minutes. As long as a creature has not disbelieved the afterimage, the afterimage counts as a creature for flanking. The afterimage lasts until the beginning of your next turn or until you use Vivacious Afterimage again, whichever comes first.

Vivacious Bravado.name: 一身是胆 Vivacious Bravado
Vivacious Bravado.description:
需求 你在当前回合获得派头@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{派头 Panache}。

派头使你的胆识膨胀，让你能暂时忽略疼痛。你获得等级+你的魅力调整值点临时生命值，此临时生命存续直到你的下个回合开始时消灭。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.T7AJQbfmlA57y625]{效果: 一身是胆}

Vivacious Conduit.name: 活力流转 Vivacious Conduit
Vivacious Conduit.description: 你与第一世界的联系已近成熟，它的正能量汹涌地灌入你的体内。如果你休息了10分钟，则你会获得等于[[/r @actor.abilities.con.mod*(ceil(@actor.level/2))]]{你的体质调整值 x 一半你的等级的生命值}。这可以和你由治疗伤害所受到的治疗叠加。

Voice Of The Night.name: 夜之声 Voice Of The Night
Voice Of The Night.description: 你听闻并理解那些与你共享黑暗的生物的言语。你可以对蝙蝠、老鼠和狼提问并从它们那里获得回答，或者对它们使用交涉技能。你在对这些动物进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}行动的时候还会获得+1环境加值。

Voice of Authority.name: Voice of Authority
Voice of Authority.description:
You easily command the attention of others, and when the time comes to turn threats into action, your authoritative voice causes foes to falter.

Your voice be heard easily by any creatures within 300 feet if you wish, regardless of the level of ambient noise, although your voice can't penetrate @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence} or similar effect. If you roll Intimidation for initiative, on the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to you.

Volatile Grease.name: 易燃油脂 Volatile Grease
Volatile Grease.description:
当你施放油脂时，你可以将其目标修改为一个生物。如果你这样做了，你可以用以下效果取代该法术的标准效果：你将可燃的油脂溅到目标身上。目标必须尝试反射豁免：

大成功 目标不受影响

成功 目标被溅上油脂并获得火焰弱点2，直到你下一回合结束。目标或相邻的生物可以用一个交互动作擦掉可燃的油脂，结束这个效果

失败 和成功一样，除了对火焰的弱点持续1分钟

升阶(+2) 弱点增加1

Walk The Plank.name: 走跳板 Walk The Plank
Walk The Plank.description:
你恐吓敌人走到你希望他所踏上的位置，在传统上是让敌人走跳板。对1名敌人尝试@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}；此次检定获得无力化（Incapacitation）特征。

成功时，除了正常效果之外，你还能迫使目标行走，移动至多等同于其速度的距离。由你选择目标要走的路径，且这被视为是你的走跳板（Walk The Plank）动作的一部分。除非你的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} 检定结果为大成功，否则你无法迫使目标移动进入有害空间（会让目标受到伤害、坠落、引发反应动作或类似的空间）。

目标会在24小时内临时免疫你的走跳板。

Wall Jump.name: 弹墙跳 Wall Jump
Wall Jump.description:
你可以蹬墙借力，连续跳几次。如果你在结束一次跳的动作（@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump}，@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}或是@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}）时邻接一个墙面，那么只要你的下一个动作仍然是尝试跳跃，那么你就不会因为身处高处而开始坠落。除此之外，因为你是借上一次跳跃的势能继续跳跃，你可以在下一次跳跃时只使用一个动作，但你不能在其中包括助跑的跑动动作。

你每回合只能弹墙跳一次。当你在运动技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你只要你的回合中仍然还有剩余的动作，那么你就可以继续进行跳跃。

Wall Run.name: 游墙功 Wall Run
Wall Run.description:
你忤逆重力，在垂直平面上如履平地。

行走最多等于速度的距离。你必须在水平平面上开始移动。该次移动你可以在比如墙壁这种垂直平面上全速移动。若你未在地面上停止行走，你会在回合结束时或下一个动作后开始坠落，取其先者（若合适，你可以尝试@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{抓住边缘 Grab an Edge}）。

若你有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6gLWr3xghsHSFwxc]{渡水步 Water Step}或类似能力，游墙功能让你在脆弱的垂直平面上行走，甚至是垂直的液体，比如瀑布。

Wandering Heart.name: 浪游之心 Wandering Heart
Wandering Heart.description: 虽然所有精灵随着时间推移都会适应他们所处的环境，但你走的如此之远，跟众多环境调谐，以至于你的身体现在可以比其他精灵更快速地变化。在与一个精灵传承相应的环境（比如极地精灵之于雪地，森林精灵之于森林与丛林）呆了一个星期之后，你的族裔传承自动转变为该传承。这个专长永远不会使你转变成一个与环境无关的精灵传承，比如@Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Nd9hdX8rdYyRozw8]{古代精灵 Ancient Elf}，@Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.jEtVesbqYcWGbBYk]{先知精灵 Seer Elf}，或者@Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.1wVDYY9Wue0G5R9Q]{低语精灵 Whisper Elf}。

Wandering Oasis.name: 浮动绿洲 Wandering Oasis
Wandering Oasis.description: 你周围环绕着一股平和的能量。你和你周围60尺内的盟友能免于炎热和严寒的环境影响。如果你在生存技能上达到传奇熟练度，则你和盟友能免受炽热和极寒环境的影响。

War Conditioning.name: 战争训练 War Conditioning
War Conditioning.description: 你在偏僻的环境中接受了广泛的训练，这让你能在这样的区域中流畅移动。当你获得该专长时，你可以选择获得20尺攀爬速度或20尺游泳速度。

Ward Against Corruption.name: 反腐化加护 Ward Against Corruption
Ward Against Corruption.description: 你的灵魂蒙受了抵抗不死与瘟疫，以及堕入邪道的原招魂者─恐亡魔的力量的加护。你在抵抗死亡效果、疾病以及任何来自不死生物或恐亡魔的效果的豁免上，获得+1环境加值。在抵抗来自不死生物或恐亡魔的死亡效果或疾病时，此加值提升为+2。

Ward Casting.name: 保险施法 Ward Casting
Ward Casting.description:
触发 准备进行@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uiGsVmvRfujQQRlK]{稳定施法 Steady Spellcasting}的纯检定，但尚未掷骰时。

你在施术时汲取缠绕全身的魔力，谨慎地保护你的施法，提高你保全该法术的几率。稳定施法的纯检定DC由15降至10。

Ward Medic.name: 医护长 Ward Medic
Ward Medic.description: 你可以照料一整个病房的病人，同时满足每一个伤患所需要的治疗。当你使用治疗疾病或是治疗伤害技能动作时，你可以同时为两个对象提供治疗；当你在医疗技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你可以同时为四个对象提供治疗；当你在医疗技能上达到传奇级时，你可以同时为八个对象提供治疗。

Ward Mind.name: Ward Mind
Ward Mind.description:
需求 You're currently affected by a mental effect that you gained by failing, but not critically failing, a saving throw.

触发 Your turn ends.

To protect the knowledge within your mind from intrusion or erasure, you ward yourself against a mental attack, temporarily delaying its effects. Until the end of your next turn, you ignore a single mental effect that meets the requirement. You can suppress a particular effect using Ward Mind or Cognitive Loophole only once, even if you have both feats.

特殊 You can use this reaction even if the mental effect prevents you from using reactions.

Warden's Boon.name: 守望者恩惠 Warden's Boon
Warden's Boon.description:
通过指出弱点，你可以将@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}和@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.mzkkj9LEWjJPBhaq]{猎手优势 Hunter's Edge}中列出的效果给予一个盟友，持续到他们的下一回合结束。这一动作会根据你使用的是手势还是呼喊，相应的获得视觉和听觉特性。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.uXCU8GgriUjuj5FV]{效果: 猎手优势(连击)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.ltIvO9ZQlmqGD89Y]{效果: 猎手优势(机智)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.mNk0KxsZMFnDjUA0]{效果: 猎手优势(精准)}

Warden's Focus.name: 戍卫聚能 Warden's Focus
Warden's Focus.description: 你在聚能时，与周遭的联系更为紧密。如果上次@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocused}到现在你至少用了2点聚能点，那你现在进行再聚能行动会恢复2点而不是1点聚能点。

Warden's Guidance.name: 守望者指引 Warden's Guidance
Warden's Guidance.description:
不管猎物隐藏的多好，你都可以将它们的位置告知你的盟友。

只要你的狩猎目标被你观察到，所有你的盟友在对其进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seeking}时投掷的失败和大失败自动变为成功。

你的盟友需要能够看到或者听到你才能获得这一效果。你需要能够进行呼喊或者使用手势才能让盟友获得这一效果。

Warden's Step.name: 守望者步伐 Warden's Step
Warden's Step.description: 你可以指导你的盟友无声通过荒野。当探索模式中，你在自然地形下进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{避人耳目 Avoid Notice}探索行动时，你可以指定任意数量的盟友获得相同的效果，如同他们在探索中也使用了这个动作。这不需要他们自己执行动作。

Warden's Wellspring.name: 戍卫源泉 Warden's Wellspring
Warden's Wellspring.description: 你在与周遭世界沟通时能进入前所未有的专注状态。如果上次@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocused}到现在你至少用了3点聚能点，那你现在进行再聚能会恢复3点而不是1点聚能点。

Warding Light.name: Warding Light
Warding Light.description:
You gain a tattoo that serves as a special ward to defend you against Walkena's forces.

The tattoo allows you to cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} cantrip as a divine innate spell at will. The cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. If you die, the tattoo immediately casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]{Gentle Repose} on your corpse, heightened to the same spell level.

Warding Rune (Abjuration).name: Warding Rune (Abjuration)
Warding Rune (Abjuration).description: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

Warding Rune (Conjuration).name: Warding Rune (Conjuration)
Warding Rune (Conjuration).description: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

Warding Rune (Enchantment).name: Warding Rune (Enchantment)
Warding Rune (Enchantment).description: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

Warding Rune (Evocation).name: Warding Rune (Evocation)
Warding Rune (Evocation).description: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

Warding Rune (Illusion).name: Warding Rune (Illusion)
Warding Rune (Illusion).description: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

Warding Rune (Necromancy).name: Warding Rune (Necromancy)
Warding Rune (Necromancy).description: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

Warding Rune (Transmutation).name: Warding Rune (Transmutation)
Warding Rune (Transmutation).description: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

Warning Shot.name: 警告射击 Warning Shot
Warning Shot.description:
需求 你正持用一把已装填的火器。

枪声咆哮如此简单明了谁还需要多费口舌？你通过朝天射击尝试对一名在火器最大射程里而非30尺的敌人使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}，即使对方不理解你的语言，本次检定也不会有-4的环境减值。

Warren Digger.name: 打洞鼠 Warren Digger
Warren Digger.description: 你学会以坚实指爪挖掘土石的手法。你获得15英尺的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{掘地 Burrow}速度。

Warren Friend.name: 隧穴乡亲 Warren Friend
Warren Friend.description: 你十分擅长跟其他鼠族拉关系。当你进入新的聚居地时，你可消耗1日休整期来自动发现最接近的鼠族社群，前提是当地真的有鼠族社群，且其成员并没有刻意向你隐瞒其存在。成功与同族接触后，你在该聚居地进行的收集信息与赚取收入检定上获得+1环境加值。

Warren Navigator.name: 隧穴向导 Warren Navigator
Warren Navigator.description:
你十分擅长破解迷宫或在错综复杂的环境里指路。你在生存技能上达到受训熟练度，若你已在生存技能上受训(例如背景或职业的效果)，改为在你自选的另一个技能上达到受训。

你在进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.fJImDBQfqfjKJOhk]{辨别方向 Sense Direction}行动或对抗@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{迷宫术 Maze}法术时，检定结果的成功度视为比实际上升1级。即使你不持有指南针也不会因此在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.fJImDBQfqfjKJOhk]{辨别方向 Sense Direction}的检定上承受减值。

Wary Disarmament.name: 谨慎解除 Wary Disarmament
Wary Disarmament.description: 如果你在解除一件装置或是陷阱时意外触发了它，你会在对抗这件装置或陷阱对你的攻击时在AC和豁免检定上获得+2环境加值。只有你因为解除装置失败而触发的那一次攻击时这个专长的加值才会生效，而后续的任何效果——比如一个多重触发的复杂陷阱——不会获得这个好处。

Wary Skulker.name: 谨慎伏行 Wary Skulker
Wary Skulker.description: 常保警戒的你在侦查危险时也不忘隐藏身形。你可在进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{侦查 Scout}探索行动的同时一并进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{避人耳目 Avoid Notice}探索行动。

Wash Out.name: 清洗干净 Wash Out
Wash Out.description: 毒素迅速从你的人造躯体中渗出。每当你对正在生效的毒素进行豁免成功时，你将其阶段减少2，或将恶性毒virulent poison的阶段减少1。每当你对正在生效的毒素进行豁免大成功时，你将其阶段减少3，或将恶性毒virulent poison的阶段减少2。

Watch Your Back.name: 提防暗箭 Watch Your Back
Watch Your Back.description:
你恐吓目标，吞食他们的恐惧，让他们对你戒慎恐惧不敢放松。

对30尺内一个目标进行一次威吓检定，对抗目标的意志DC。如果成功，1分钟内，目标在对抗你时的察觉检定获得+2状态加值，但在对抗恐惧效果时的意志豁免承受-2状态减值。

Watch and Learn.name: Watch and Learn
Watch and Learn.description:
触发 An ally you can see succeeds or critically succeeds at a Strength- or Dexterity-based skill check, using a skill in which you are untrained.

Pathfinder agents serve as members of diverse teams with complementary skill sets. You are practiced at following the example of a more skilled ally to accomplish a wide variety of tasks. For the next minute you can add your level as a proficiency bonus to the observed skill check, even though you are untrained. This does not allow you to attempt trained actions using that skill unless you would otherwise be able to do so.

Watchful Gaze.name: 警戒注视 Watchful Gaze
Watchful Gaze.description:
你利用你繁多的眼睛来同时看向四面八方，这让你在短时间内获得极其敏锐的观察力。直到你的下一个回合开始时，你获得@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{全域视野 All-Around Vision}。这让你能够同时看见所有方向，因此无法被夹击。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.a7qiSYdlaIRPe57i]{效果: 警戒注视}

Watchful Halfling.name: 警惕半身人 Watchful Halfling
Watchful Halfling.description:
你的集体生活方式让你密切地关注着周围的人，你更容易注意到他们的行为是否不正常。当你使用察言观色基本动作来注意到被惑控或附身的角色时，你的察觉检定获得+2环境加值。如果你没有主动对一个被惑控或附身的角色使用察言观色，那么GM应进行一次暗骰来判断你是否通过某种方式注意到了惑控或附身，此骰没有原本的环境加值且有着-2环境减值。

除了将协助基本动作用于技能检定，你还可以使他人对抗惑控或附身的豁免或其他检定获得加值。和正常的援助动作一样，你需要在你的回合花费一个动作做好准备以鼓舞那个生物对抗这些效果。

Water Conjuration.name: 造水 Water Conjuration
Water Conjuration.description: 无论你走到哪里，海洋始终伴随着你。你可以将@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WzLKjSw6hsBhuklC]{造水术 Create Water}作为原能内在法术每天施放一次。每次你施展造水术时，你可以选择是造淡水还是造盐水。

Water Dancer.name: 水舞者 Water Dancer
Water Dancer.description: 你能优雅地在水面滑行。在水生或沼泽环境中时，你会忽略非魔法困难地形的影响。此外，向上或向下游泳对你来说也不是困难地形。

Water Sprint.name: 踏浪 Water Sprint
Water Sprint.description:
经验和训练告诉你，水有足够的表面张力让大师踏浪而行。

当你以一条直线行走时，若至少一半速度是在地面上，则剩下的速度可以用在液体上移动。若行走结束时未出在坚实地面上，你依然会掉入水里。

若你运动技能为传奇，则只要你在坚实地面上开始行走，剩下的行走部分都可在水面上移动，不走一条直线也没关系，当然，行走结束时若未处于坚实地面，还是会掉入水中。

Water Step.name: 渡水步 Water Step
Water Step.description: 你可以行走过液体表面或无法支撑你重量的表面。这个好处只会在你移动中保持。若你结束移动的表面无法支撑你，你依然会坠落或它会正常塌陷。

Water Strider.name: 水上漂 Water Strider
Water Strider.description: 托着你的每一脚步，让你在它的表面行走。你以最大速度行走。在你的移动过程中，你可以在不支持你体重的液体上移动。如果你在一个不能支撑你的表面上结束你的动作，你会在动作结束时掉进液体中。此外，你可以花费三个动作以你三倍的速度行走。

Wave Spiral.name: 潮浪螺旋 Wave Spiral
Wave Spiral.description:
频率 每分钟一次

需求 你处于波纹架势。

你沉下身子并快速旋转，释放出巨大的水流漩涡。进行一次运动技能检定来对@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺弥漫范围}内所有地面上的生物使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}。

这些攻击数都算入你的多重攻击罚值，但在你完成所有这些攻击后，罚值才会增加。

Wavetouched Paragon.name: 伏波典范 Wavetouched Paragon
Wavetouched Paragon.description:
你受到大海的祝福，被赐予能像鱼一样游泳的能力。你获得15尺游泳速度。

特殊 如果你有博努瓦伏波(Bonuwat Wavetouched)背景，你可以在1级选取此专长而非5级。

Waxed Feathers.name: 复蜡羽毛 Waxed Feathers
Waxed Feathers.description: 你的羽毛上复盖着一层防水的蜡质涂层，你在投掷带有水特征的效果豁免时获得+1环境加值。只要你处在干燥的地方，你可以用一个动作甩掉你衣服和羽毛上残留的任何水迹，立刻恢复到干燥状态。

Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator.name: Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator
Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator.description: You are adept at using the unusual resonance of your wayfinder to aid in any deceptions you might employ. 每天一次 you can activate your wayfinder to cast illusory disguise, heightened to 2nd level, as an arcane spell. Additionally, 每天一次, you can Activate your wayfinder with a single-action envision activation to transform it into a perfect replica of another similarly sized badge of membership or office, such as an Aspis Consortium badge. This transformation lasts for 1 hour.

Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer.name: Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer.description: You can use the unusual resonance of your wayfinder to grant it additional effects. Choose one cantrip from the arcane, divine, occult, or primal list. You can activate your wayfinder to cast that cantrip at will. As normal, this cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. Additionally, you can Activate your wayfinder with a Single Action (envision) activation to transform it into a nondescript pin or brooch to hide your affiliation with the Pathfinder Society. This transformation lasts for 1 hour.

We March On.name: 我们继续前进 We March On
We March On.description: 你确保你的盟友在旅行时都能跟上你的脚步。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5ZsmRm7HvFAw2XDZ]{带头大哥 Caravan Leader}和@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.38uOVS8fLZxraUrg]{加快步伐 Pick Up The Pace}通用专长，即使你不满足其先决条件。

Weapon Improviser Dedication.name: 无招武师入门 Weapon Improviser Dedication
Weapon Improviser Dedication.description:
在使用临时武器（Improvised Weapons）战斗时，你不会在攻击检定上承受通常的-2减值。除此之外，只要你在某一职业的职业能力上获得了对任何武器的专家级（Expert）或是更高级的熟练等级，这个熟练等级会同样作用于你使用的临时武器。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从无招武师变体中获得了其他两个专长

Weapon Proficiency.name: 武器擅长 Weapon Proficiency
Weapon Proficiency.description:
你现在获得对所有的简单武器（Simple Weapons）的受训。如果你已经在所有的简单武器上受训，你获得所有军用武器（Military Weapons）的受训。如果你已经在所有的军用武器上受训，你获得一件你所选的进阶武器（Advanced Weapons）的受训

特殊 你可以多次选择本专长。每次选择本专长时，你可以获得新的武器受训，按照本专长效果所述的提升步骤。

Weapon Supremacy.name: 至高武力 Weapon Supremacy
Weapon Supremacy.description: 你的武器使用技巧让你的攻击总是迅捷如风。你获得永久的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}效果。你仅能使用此额外动作进行普通攻击。

Weapon-Rune Shifter.name: Weapon-Rune Shifter
Weapon-Rune Shifter.description: You learn how to alter the magic of weapon runes by using a crystal as a focusing component. 每天一次 during your daily preparations, you can focus on a rune's magical energies through a crystal's facets to alter a single property rune on one weapon in your possession to suppress its normal effects and make it function as a different property rune. You can temporarily alter the rune to function as one of the following runes: corrosive, flaming, frost, ghost touch, grievous, returning, shock, thundering, or wounding. The property rune remains altered until you make your next daily preparations. The weapon must meet the prerequisites for the temporary rune, and any other runes that required the suppressed rune are also suppressed while the rune is transformed. The rune is obviously altered, and thus the weapon can't be sold as though it had the temporary rune.

Web Hunter.name: 蛛网猎手 Web Hunter
Web Hunter.description: 通过精心培育高度敏感的刚毛，你已经发展出了不通过视觉就能感知到生物的能力。你获得15尺不精确的震颤感知。当你和一个生物同时触碰到一件已被固定的绳状物体（例如绳子、蛛网或者丝线），你通过不精确的震颤感知来感知到它的范围增加到60尺。

Web Walker.name: 网行者 Web Walker
Web Walker.description: 你对操控蛛网的技巧做了大量的练习。在你对抗蛛网术（web）、天然蛛网、以及能让你陷入蛛网的效果时，你的豁免和AC获得+2环境加值。同时，你在对抗其他可能诱捕或纠缠你的效果时，例如纠缠术（entangle），你的豁免和AC获得+1环境加值。无论何时，当你对抗导致你陷入蛛网的效果时成功通过豁免检定，你将得到大成功的结果。

Web Weaver.name: 织网者 Web Weaver
Web Weaver.description:
你能喷出柔软的丝，并将其编织成有用之物。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dTjzxCy9pku5gL0F]{专门制作(编织) Specialty Crafting (Weaving)}专长。

你可以使用你的网来@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{制作 Craft}简单的、非消耗性的、由线编织成的物品，例如衣服和绳索，只要它们的基础价格少于1sp甚至零成本。这些物品没有出售的价值，并且如果不经过定期（且一定程度地）维护的话，24小时后就会自然降解。你可以同时维护最多10个这样的物品；如果你创造出了新物品，最早制造出来的物品就因为缺乏维护而降解。

这些临时物品只需要你花费1天的时间来制作，而不是4天。如果你在手艺上达到专家熟练度，你可以在1小时内制造出这些物品，大师为10分钟，传奇为1分钟。

Webslinger.name: 蛛网投射 Webslinger
Webslinger.description:
频率 每10分钟一次

你将你能制造丝网的能力和你的魔法力量相结合，允许你以极高的频率创造不可思议的大网。此效果相当于2环@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9s5tqqXNzcoKamWx]{蛛网术 Web}，使用你的职业DC@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:magical,conjuration]或法术DC@Check[type:athletics|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:magical,conjuration]，二者以更高的为准。

Weight of Guilt.name: 负罪之重 Weight of Guilt
Weight of Guilt.description: 负罪感笼罩在那些忽视你救赎瞥视的敌人心中。你可以选择取代给触发反应动作的生物造成力竭2，令其在同样的时间内承受呆滞2。

Weighty Impact.name: 重量冲击 Weighty Impact
Weighty Impact.description: 你的幻灵将敌人击倒。选择一种幻灵的具有摔绊特征的无武装攻击。该攻击获得@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}动作。

Well-Groomed.name: 仪表堂堂 Well-Groomed
Well-Groomed.description:
你对个人卫生有着严格的坚持，或是经常自舔理毛，或是勤奋地使用猫族传统卫浴工具，使自己总是干净整洁。

你在抵抗疾病效果的豁免上，获得+1环境加值。你在抵抗疾病效果的豁免骰上成功时，视为大成功处理。

Well-Met Traveler.name: 四海游龙 Well-Met Traveler
Well-Met Traveler.description:
你在旅途中遇见了世界上各地各行各业的人，自然养成了与他人交流时亲切和蔼的态度。你在交涉技能上受训，若你会在交涉技能上自动受训(例如背景或职业的效果)，改为让由你自选的另一个技能受训。

你获得八面玲珑@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4RjDxgvNXNl5GG9d]{八面玲珑 Hobnobber}技能专长。

注意：如果你已在此专长赋予的技能上受训，你需要手动选择替代技能。

Well-Versed.name: 内行看门道 Well-Versed
Well-Versed.description: 你对非你的表演影响有一定的抵抗力。你在对抗有听觉、幻术、语言学、音波或视觉特征的效果时，在豁免检定上获得+1环境加值。

Wellspring Control.name: 泉眼掌控 Wellspring Control
Wellspring Control.description: 当你的泉眼开始冲激时，你可以骰两次骰子并选择你想要的效果。专长效果导致其它生物冲激不会触发这个效果。

Wellspring Mage Dedication.name: 泉源法师入门 Wellspring Mage Dedication
Wellspring Mage Dedication.description:
你每天能从泉眼获得的临时法术位不再受限。

特殊 直至选取另外两个泉源法师变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

Westyr's Wayfinder Repository.name: Westyr's Wayfinder Repository
Westyr's Wayfinder Repository.description:
需求 You have at least one 1st-level spell slot and a wayfinder.

You can use your wayfinder to store a little extra magic for when you need it most. When making your daily preparations, you can choose one 1st-level spell from your spellbook or spell repertoire and store it in your wayfinder. You can cast this spell from the wayfinder using the normal actions required. Once the spell has been cast, it is expended, and you must make your next daily preparations to store another spell in your wayfinder.

Wheedle and Jig.name: 连哄带跳 Wheedle and Jig
Wheedle and Jig.description: 你会用滑稽的动作和愚蠢的声音来吸引旁观者。每天一次，你可以将@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IihxWhRfpsBgQ5jS]{注目术 Enthrall}作为3环奥术内在法术施展。

Whirling Blade Stance.name: 游鸢式 Whirling Blade Stance
Whirling Blade Stance.description:
你进入了一个沉静的架式，你与你的武僧武器间产生了紧密的联系，让你能以气御刀。

你持握且拥有娴熟特征的近战武僧武器获得投掷10尺的特征(除非这武器已经有了能投的更远的特征)。

当你用这种武器做了投掷打击后，你精准的投掷力道可以进行额外打击，就算武器与你有段距离。在判断新目标在不在打击范围内时，要以先前目标的空间当作开始计算武器的射程增量。在你的回合结束时，该投掷武器会笔直地朝你飞回来。如果路径上有坚固的屏障，那武器会在撞到屏障后落下。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.JefXqvhzUeBArkAP]{架势: 游鸢式}

Whirling Knockdown.name: Whirling Knockdown
Whirling Knockdown.description:
需求 You're wielding a loaded one-handed firearm and a one-handed melee weapon.

You fire your gun while throwing off a target's balance with your melee weapon. Then, you topple your foe to the ground with the quick orchestrated combination. You don't need to use brute force to do so, or even necessarily to hit with your gunshot; the effect is all about performing perfectly and eliminating your target's movements and options, leaving them no choice but to fall.

Make a ranged firearm Strike against a creature within the reach of your melee weapon and then attempt a Performance check against the creature's Reflex DC. If the Strike critically succeeds, the target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its Reflex DC against this check. The Performance check has the following effects.

大成功 The target falls and lands @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}. It takes [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6 bludgeoning damage} from the fall.

成功 The target falls and lands prone.

大失败 Your plans backfired on you, and you're forced to drop your melee weapon in your space.

Whirling Throw.name: 回旋抛投 Whirling Throw
Whirling Throw.description:
需求 你正@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}住一个生物。

你将被你擒抱或束缚住的生物抛开一定距离。你投掷该生物的距离最多为10尺+你每有1点力量调整值*5尺。若你抛投成功，它会受到等于你力量调整值+每抛出10尺距离1d6点钝击伤害。

尝试一次运动 技能检定对抗敌人的强韧DC。若目标比你大一个体型，你获得-2环境减值，若目标比你大一个体型以上，你获得-4环境减值。若目标比你小一个体型，你获得+2环境加值，若目标比你小一个体型以上，你获得+4环境加值。

大成功 抛投成功且目标会俯卧@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

成功 抛投成功。

失败 抛投失败。

大失败 抛投失败，且目标不再被你擒抱或束缚。

Whirlwind Spell.name: 奥术狂风 Whirlwind Spell
Whirlwind Spell.description:
需求 你的法术打击已充能（charged）

你将一个多目标法术（multitarget spell）的能量与狂风骤雨般的攻击结合。你进行法术打击，对你触及范围内所有敌人而不是单一敌人都进行一次近战打击。如果你的法术可以影响多个目标，则你的法术影响到所有你命中的敌人，而不是第一个目标，最多为法术通常的最多目标数。如果你打击的敌人多于法术可以选择的数量，选择哪些敌人受到法术影响。每次打击都会计算你的多重攻击减值，但是直到你完成所有打击为止不会增加你的减值。

如果你根据 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.84n92oBsRVCxjifM]{拓展法术打击} 使用一个区域法术进行法术打击时，按照扩展法术打击的描述应用区域，选择你打击的生物之一来决定区域以及法术是否因为打击大失败而失效。如果你根据扩展法术打击使用一个指向性法术（targeted spell）进行法术打击时，如果每次打击都大失败则法术完全失效，但是法术不会因为单次大失败而完全失效。

你只能在近战打击（melee Strikes）时使用这一动作，即使你拥有星火流矢融汇研究（starlit span hybrid study）或类似能力也不行。

Whirlwind Stance.name: Whirlwind Stance
Whirlwind Stance.description:
需求 You are wielding your staff, which must have the parry trait.

You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as you remain in this stance.

Whirlwind Strike.name: 旋风打击 Whirlwind Strike
Whirlwind Strike.description: 你攻击附近的所有敌人。对你近战触及范围内的所有敌人进行一次普通攻击。每次攻击都会累计你的多重攻击减值，但不会在你完成所有的攻击前增加你的减值。

Whirlwind Toss.name: Whirlwind Toss
Whirlwind Toss.description:
需求 You have a foe grabbed.

You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away in imitation of the techniques of your rival, Ran-To. You Thrash. During this Thrash, your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WY7CjISdz6uwXwIb]{Collateral Thrash} feat applies to all foes adjacent to you. You can then throw the grabbed creature 10 feet, where they fall @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}.

If the foe you choose for Collateral Thrash is also adjacent to you, they attempt only one save and take the damage only once.

Whodunnit?.name: 谁干的 Whodunnit?
Whodunnit?.description:
频率 每天一次

你慎重思索着你的案件，并将思绪缩小至某些细节。当你使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{追查方向 Pursue a Lead}行动并完成行动时，你能花10分钟而非1分钟，向GM问两个问题。

GM必须诚实回答「是」或「否」，但如果回答会误导或对你的调查没有实际用处，GM可以回答「无关」。你在一个方向上只能问一次「谁干的?」，不管经过几天都一样。

你的问题必须出自下表，不论是用在生物还是你找到的线索：

  • 这个线索是由[生物特征]遗留的吗?（选择一个生物特征，例如类人、不死或矮人；这特性必须精准到从线索被遗留时开始）。
  • 线索被留下的时间在一小时内吗？
  • 线索被留下的时间在一天内吗？
  • 留下线索的生物在留下线索时情绪强烈吗？
  • 该生物有没有试着想隐藏这个线索？

Wholeness of Body.name: 混元体 Wholeness of Body
Wholeness of Body.description: 你能通过运气恢复生命。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qJZZdYBdNaWRJFER]{混元体 Wholeness of Body}真气法术。你聚能池中聚能点的数量+1。

Wide Overwatch.name: Wide Overwatch
Wide Overwatch.description: Through a variety of perceptive techniques, careful routines, and upgrades to your enhanced visual gear, you have become able to observe and maintain your overwatch at a much greater distance. Increase the size of your overwatch field from 30 feet to 60 feet.

Widen Spell.name: 扩展法术 Widen Spell
Widen Spell.description: 你能操纵你法术的能量，让它能影响更广的区域。如果你下个动作是 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Cast a Spell} ，然后它的区域是爆发、圆锥或线型，并且没有持续时间，你就可以增加该法术的区域。如果爆发半径最短有10呎的法术，你可以把它的半径额外加5呎(如果连爆发10呎半径都没有，该法术不受影响)。 如果圆锥或线型长度最长是15呎或15呎以内的法术，你可以把它的长度额外加5呎，如果是长度超过15呎的圆锥或线型，那额外加10呎。

Widen the Gap.name: Widen the Gap
Widen the Gap.description: Once you have penetrated a foe's defenses, you can home in on the same spot to exploit your opponent's wound and deal some serious damage. The second time you hit and deal damage with a melee axe Strike to the same opponent or object during your turn, you ignore half of the opponent's or object's Hardness, if any. If you hit and deal damage with a melee axe Strike to the same opponent or object a third or fourth time during your turn, you ignore all of its Hardness, if any.

Wild Empathy.name: 野性认同 Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.description: 你与自然世界的生物有一种联系，让你可以跟他们进行基本程度的交流。你可以使用交涉技能给动物@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}，也可以进行简单的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{请求 Requests}。大多数情况下，野生动物都会给你足够的时间完成交涉。

Wild Lights.name: 野性之光 Wild Lights
Wild Lights.description: 当你施放舞光术时，你可以将其持续时间修改为1分钟，并修改其标准效果，以创造一个具有超小型生物形状的漂浮光源，而不是最多四个光源。这个生物会在你的头上盘旋，除非你花一个具有专注特性的单动作来引导光源移动最多30英尺，在这种情况下，它会一直留在那里直到你再次引导它。如果你引导它回到你的头上，它就会在你头上盘旋并再次跟随你，直到你把它引导到其他地方。如果生物移动到你的120英尺以外，它就会立即消失。

Wild Shape.name: 野性变身 Wild Shape
Wild Shape.description: 你的身上充满了野性，总是尝试迎接任何挑战。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{野性变身 Wild Shape}派系法术，使你可以通过德鲁伊专长扩展变化的形态。

Wild Strider.name: 荒野漫步者 Wild Strider
Wild Strider.description: 自然障碍对你来说不算什么。你获得游侠的@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{荒野漫步 Wild Stride}职业特性。这让你忽略所有非魔法困难地形的效果，将高等困难地形（greater difficult terrain）视为普通的困难地形，并且让你根据地形来在@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{偏好地形 Favored Terrain} 内获得额外的好处。

Wild Winds Gust.name: 狂风呼啸 Wild Winds Gust
Wild Winds Gust.description:
需求 你处于@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{狂风架势 Wild Winds Stance}中。

凝聚储存的能量在一瞬间以飓风形式喷发而出。对30尺锥形或60尺直线内所有你选择的生物进行一次风袭打击。这些攻击都会计算多次攻击减值，但在所有这些攻击完成前，多次攻击减值不会增加。

Wild Winds Initiate.name: 狂风袭来 Wild Winds Initiate
Wild Winds Initiate.description:
所学的玄妙架势让你能隔空攻击。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{狂风架势 Wild Winds Stance}真气法术。你聚能池中聚能点的数量+1。

尽管进入架势是一个真气法术，但架势给予的风袭打击并不是，因此在架势中你可以自由使用风袭。

Wildborn Adept.name: 野性专家 Wildborn Adept
Wildborn Adept.description: 丛林的低语赐予你更多样的原能魔法。你可以将@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{舞光术 Dancing Lights}，@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{打击死灵 Disrupt Undead}，和@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{绊足术 Tanglefoot}作为内在原能法术随意施展。如果你在野性魔法中选择了上述法术中的一个，那你可以为野性魔法重新选择一个新的法术。

Wildborn Magic.name: 野性魔法 Wildborn Magic
Wildborn Magic.description:
许可 穆阿里雅裔

你已习得如何获取蛮荒之地的古老魔法。从原能法术列表中选择一个戏法。你可以将这个戏法作为内在原能法术随意施展。戏法将被升阶至等同你等级一半(向上取整)的环数。

Wilderness Spotter.name: Wilderness Spotter
Wilderness Spotter.description:
Select one type of terrain from the following list: aquatic, arctic, desert, forest, mountain, plains, sky, swamp, or underground. You can use Survival in place of Perception to roll initiative when in the selected terrain in a natural location (not a structure) even if you weren't tracking or otherwise using Survival before the encounter. You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations in the chosen terrain; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.

特殊 You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, the feat applies to a new type of terrain.

Wilderness Spotter (Aquatic).name: Wilderness Spotter (Aquatic)
Wilderness Spotter (Aquatic).description:
You can use Survival in place of Perception to roll initiative when in aquatic terrain in a natural location (not a structure) even if you weren't tracking or otherwise using Survival before the encounter.

You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations in aquatic terrain; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.

特殊 You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, the feat applies to a new type of terrain.

Wilderness Spotter (Arctic).name: Wilderness Spotter (Arctic)
Wilderness Spotter (Arctic).description:

You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations in arctic terrain; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.

Wilderness Spotter (Desert).name: Wilderness Spotter (Desert)
Wilderness Spotter (Desert).description:

You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations in desert terrain; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.

Wilderness Spotter (Mountain).name: Wilderness Spotter (Mountain)
Wilderness Spotter (Mountain).description:

You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations in mountainous terrain; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.

特殊 You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, the feat applies to a new type of terrain.

Wilderness Spotter (Plains).name: Wilderness Spotter (Plains)
Wilderness Spotter (Plains).description:
You can use Survival in place of Perception to roll initiative when on plains in a natural location (not a structure) even if you weren't tracking or otherwise using Survival before the encounter.

You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations on plains; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.

特殊 You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, the feat applies to a new type of terrain.

You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations in the sky; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.

特殊 You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, the feat applies to a new type of terrain.

Wilderness Spotter (Swamp).name: Wilderness Spotter (Swamp)
Wilderness Spotter (Swamp).description:

You can also use Survival instead of Perception to notice traps in natural locations in swampy terrain; if you find a snare in this way, you can also use Survival instead of Thievery to Disable the Device.
